1.title: Meet Misty & Kristy
1.plot: A heart-felt introduction to the world of the Miller twins. They run a multi-million dollar logging business with Kristy's husband Shannon. Get to meet some of the people from Honaker, Virginia, meet the mayor and get to know the girls along the way. Sit back and enjoy the fun . . . Meet Misty & Kristy.

2.title: Hunting Trip
2.plot: Misty and Kristy plan a hunting trip as a surprise for Kristy's husband, Shannon. The only problem is Shannon doesn't like surprises, but then again, neither does Misty. So sit back and enjoy this action packed episode of fun, it's Misty and Kristy.

3.title: It's My Birthday
3.plot: Misty & Kristy spend their birthday on the billfold where they grew up, reminiscing on the past. Then make a trip to their birthday party for a good old fashion "Hoedown" featuring the Whitecap Mountain Band and a pie to the face. So sit back and enjoy this birthday celebration, it's Misty & Kristy.

4.title: Zinger Bats
4.plot: Misty & Kristy get a special visit from the owner of Zinger Bats and one of his employees. The girls show them some good old southern hospitality and teach them a little about where the wood from their bats come from. So sit back and enjoy, it's Misty & Kristy.

5.title: Sick Day
5.plot: It's another cold, snowy day in Honker, Virginia and Kristy is sick in bed. Never fear, because here comes Misty to the rescue. The real question, is Misty there to help Kristy or to play dress up with her dog? So sit back and enjoy this fun filled episode, it's Misty & Kristy.

6.title: Mistaken Identity
6.plot: Today Misty takes advantage of being mistaken for Kristy with a high dollar shopping spree, and later gets her chance at running the logging business. Let's just say, this one ends with a bang. So buckle up for a half hour of fun, It's Misty & Kristy!

7.title: The Carter Family Fold
7.plot: Today Misty & Kristy travel to one of the birth places for country music, Hiltons, Virginia, and visit the legendary "Carter Family Fold", the last place the late great Johnny Cash performed. The girls learn some history about country music and team up with family for a good old Clogging dance off. This one 's gonna be fun, it's Misty & Kristy!

8.title: Motorcycle Heaven
8.plot: Misty & Kristy, our twins from Honaker, Virginia venture off into the fast-paced world of motorcycles! Not quite sure the motorcycle community is ready for them. Let's see what they have in store for us on two wheels. Let's RIDE with Misty & Kristy!

9.title: Pretend Talk Show
9.plot: Today is an interesting day for Misty & Kristy. Mr Therapist thought since these two get so excited pretending that their reporters, why not give them their own "Pretend Talk Show". The girls got so excited that they invited a few friends in, to see what they could do in front of the cameras. This one's going to be a hoot. It's Misty & Kristy's Pretend Talk Show!

10.title: Motorsport Experience
10.plot: Our twins from Honker Virginia venture off into the fast paced world of Motorsports. I don't care if it's behind the wheel or just along for the ride, these girls have a serious need for speed. So buckle up and hang on . . . It's Misty & Kristy!

11.title: My Truck Is Bigger Than Yours
11.plot: Howdy Y'all, welcome to Honaker Virginia, the town where our favorite twins are always trying to find away to have a little extra fun. Today, Misty & Kristy battle it out "Truck-Pull" style, between "Pretty Boy" and his buddies. With these two involved, you know it's always going to be an adventure. So start those engines and put those trucks in gear, because its truck-pull time with Misty & Kristy!

12.title: Our Journals
12.plot: Howdy Y'all, welcome to Honaker Virginia, today is a very special day as Mr. Therapist has our twins read from their Journals. The girls revisit the past and some mischief along the way. So sit back and enjoy . . . Misty & Kristy.

13.title: Cruising Down Memory Lane
13.plot: Howdy Y'all, today's episode we see Misty & Kristy looking for a classic car with their good friend Jim Moore. The girls later take their new vehicle down the highway, which gives the twins opportunity to reminisce the great times they've had during season #1. So put your sunglasses on and put the top down as we cruise down memory lane with . . . Misty & Kristy.
